# Your Digital Commander Shepard

> One shepherd to rule them all

AI governance blog about human-in-the-loop, MCP, the almighty Context, tokens, and other delights, goodies, and small optimizations.

## Topics

- AI governance frameworks
- Human-in-the-loop architectures
- Automation with guardrails
- AI tool reviews through a governance lens
